title: user authentication flows
description: Test the sign-up, sign-in, and password reset flows to ensure proper session persistence and error handling.

title: product browsing and searching
description: Verify that product grids on home and category pages load within 2 seconds and support search, filtering, and pagination.

title: seller profile management
description: Test creation and editing of seller profiles, including business type selection and product listing management with AI-assisted suggestions.

title: pos multiorder checkout and offline sync
description: Validate POS module functionality including multi-order cart management, quantity and discount editing, payment processing with splitting, and offline order queue synchronization.

title: real time chat functionality
description: Ensure real-time chat between buyers and sellers works correctly, including automatic conversation creation on product views and message sending/receiving.

title: data security and row level security enforcement
description: Verify that Supabase Row-Level Security strictly enforces user data access permissions, preventing unauthorized data retrieval or modification.

title: settings panel updates and persistence
description: Test updating business type configuration, receipt customization, and location management settings, ensuring changes persist and receipt previews update accordingly.

title: analytics dashboard accuracy
description: Validate that analytics dashboards display accurate sales, orders, receipt overviews, and daily metrics aggregated from backend rollups.

title: product creation and editing validation
description: Test product creation and editing forms for input validation, AI-assisted description and category suggestions, image uploads, and successful data submission with fallback support.

title: ui responsiveness and cross browser compatibility
description: Verify that major UI components are responsive and compatible across modern desktop and mobile browsers as specified.
